statements: SELECT * FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, approval_status FROM approved_vendors WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM approved_vendors WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors WHERE services_provided ->> 'service' = 'Consulting';
SELECT vendor_name, services_provided -> 'fees' FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM approved_vendors WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM approved_vendors WHERE services_provided ->> 'service_1' = 'Service A';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, performance_rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM approved_vendors WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate FROM performance_tracking;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, recycling_rate, collection_date FROM approved_vendors INNER JOIN performance_tracking ON approved_vendors.vendor_id = performance_tracking.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(recycling_rate) AS max_rate FROM performance_tracking;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, location, service_type FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM vendor_history GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE service_type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS performance_count FROM approved_vendors JOIN vendor_performance ON approved_vendors.vendor_id = vendor_performance.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, activity_date FROM approved_vendors JOIN vendor_history ON approved_vendors.vendor_id = vendor_history.vendor_id WHERE YEAR(activity_date) = 2022;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM approved_vendors JOIN vendor_performance ON approved_vendors.vendor_id = vendor_performance.vendor_id WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vendor_name, approval_date FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT review_rating, review_date, review_comments FROM vendor_reviews WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM recycling_materials WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT vendor_name, review_rating FROM approved_vendors JOIN vendor_reviews ON approved_vendors.vendor_id = vendor_reviews.vendor_id;
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM recycling_materials WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_tracking WHERE collection_weight BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location, status FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM approved_vendors WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT service_type, unit_price FROM recycling_services WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT vendor_id, service_id, date_started FROM vendor_services WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM approved_vendors
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM approved_vendors WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM approved_vendors WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT vendor_name, location, contact_person FROM approved_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT vendor_name, location, contact_person FROM approved_vendors WHERE status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
